refsect1.title: 描述
refsect1.simpara: fopen binds a named resource, specified by filename, to a stream. If filename is of the form "scheme://...", it is assumed to be a URL and PHP will search for a protocol handler (also known as a wrapper) for that scheme. If no wrappers for that protocol are registered, PHP will emit a notice to help you track potential problems in your script and then continue as though filename specifies a regular file.

If PHP has decided that filename specifies a local file, then it will try to open a stream on that file. The file must be accessible to PHP, so you need to ensure that the file access permissions allow this access. If you have enabled safe_mode, or open_basedir further restrictions may apply.

If PHP has decided that filename specifies a registered protocol, and that protocol is registered as a network URL, PHP will check to make sure that allow_url_fopen is enabled. If it is switched off, PHP will emit a warning and the fopen call will fail.

note.simpara: 你可以在 找到支持的协议。

refsect1.para:
mode 指定了打开文件的方式， 它可以是以下的几种情况：
'r' - 以只读方式打开文件；把文件指针放到文件开头。
'r+' - 以可读写方式打开文件；把文件指针放到文件开头。
'w' - 以只写方式打开文件；把文件指针放到文件开头并清除文件内的所有内容。 如果文件不存在，则尝试建立。
'w+' - 以可读写方式打开文件；把文件指针放到文件开头并清除文件内的所有内容。 如果文件不存在，则尝试建立。
'a' - 以只写方式打开文件；把文件指针放到文件开头。 如果文件不存在，则尝试建立。
'a+' - 以可读写方式打开文件；把文件指针放到文件开头。 如果文件不存在，则尝试建立。

note.para: 可以在 mode 内加入字母‘b’。 它只在区分二进制文件和文本文件的系统上有用（例如 Windows。它对于Unix不起作用）。 如果不需要，可以忽略。推荐您用‘b’使您的代码更轻便。

refsect1.para: 如果你要在 include_path 里搜索文件的话， 可以将第三个参数 use_include_path 设为‘1’或 &true;。
The optional fourth zcontext is used for specifying tuning parameters and callbacks.
refsect1.simpara: 如果打开失败，函数会返回 &false;.

If you are experiencing problems with reading and writing to files and you're using the server module version of PHP, remember to make sure that the files and directories you're using are accessible to the server process.
refsect1.para:
在Windows平台，小心漏掉文件路径中的任何一个反斜杠或斜杠。
<?php $handle = fopen ("c:\\data\\info.txt", "r"); ?>
